channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2023081464
item.description:
Report X-2023081464

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: NEW ORLEANS
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Norfolk Southern reported hearing a leak from the top of tank car TILX304567. Upon inspection by a contractor, the car was found to be leaking from a partially open vapor valve with a cross-threaded closure plug. The valve was closed and the plug installed.
